title: Security Test Harness Template
template:
#!/bin/bash
# URN: {urn}

# Given
{given_setup}

# When
response=$(curl -s -w "\n%{{http_code}}" \
  -X {method} \
  {headers} \
  {body} \
  "{url}")

status_code=$(echo "$response" | tail -n1)
body=$(echo "$response" | head -n-1)

# Then
if [ "$status_code" -eq {expected_status} ]; then
  status="PASS"
else
  status="FAIL"
fi

echo "{\"urn\":\"{urn}\",\"status\":\"$status\",\"details\":{\"status_code\":$status_code}}"

[ "$status" == "PASS" ]
